body: Wizards and divine spellcasters must prepare their spells in advance. During preparation, the character chooses which spells to prepare with metamagic feats (and thus which ones take up higher-level spell slots than normal).
name: Wizards and Divine Spellcasters
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Feats/Types of Feats/Metamagic Feats/Wizards and Divine Spellcasters
